```lisp
[
  (:action select
   ; Select a suitable resource and update selection status
   :parameters (?agent - person ?resource - object)
   :precondition (and (inventory ?agent ?resource))
   :effect (and (selected ?resource))
  )

  (:action create
   ; Create or assemble an item from given resources
   :parameters (?agent - person ?item1 - object ?item2 - object ?result - object)
   :precondition (and (inventory ?agent ?item1) (or (inventory ?agent ?item2) (found ?item2)) (selected ?item1))
   :effect (and (inventory ?agent ?result) (not (inventory ?agent ?item1)) (not (inventory ?agent ?item2)))
  )

  (:action finish
   ; Complete a resource and update task status
   :parameters (?agent - person ?item - object)
   :precondition (and (inventory ?agent ?item))
   :effect (and (completed ?item) (not (inventory ?agent ?item)))
  )
]
```
